results.description: Surrey sign former South Africa batsman Hashim Amla on a two-year Kolpak contract.
results.shortTitle: Surrey sign ex-South Africa batsman Amla
results.title: Hashim Amla: Surrey sign ex-South Africa batsman on Kolpak deal

results.description: Reece Topley signs a two-year white-ball contract with Surrey after turning down a new deal at Sussex earlier this month.
results.shortTitle: Topley joins Surrey on white-ball deal
results.title: Reece Topley: Surrey sign England left-arm seamer on two-year white-ball deal

results.description: Pakistan leg-spinner Shadab Khan and Australian batsman D'Arcy Short will play in next year's T20 Blast.
results.shortTitle: Surrey sign Shadab and Short for T20
results.title: Surrey: Shadab Khan and D'Arcy Short join Surrey for T20 Blast in 2020

results.description: Australia seamer Michael Neser will join Surrey for the first half of the 2020 County Championship campaign.
results.shortTitle: Surrey sign Australia seamer Neser
results.title: Michael Neser: Surrey sign Australia seamer for first half of 2020 season

results.description: Surrey duo Jordan Clark and Conor McKerr sign deals to keep them at the club until the end of the 2022 season.
results.shortTitle: Surrey's Clark and McKerr extend deals
results.title: Jordan Clark and Conor McKerr: Surrey pair sign contracts until end of 2022

results.description: Experienced spinner Gareth Batty and all-rounders Rikki Clarke and Gus Atkinson sign new one-year contracts with Surrey.

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Surrey and England batsman Ollie Pope makes his eighth first-class hundred, but their game against Notts looks set for a draw.

results.description: Just two overs are possible on day two of Surrey's Championship match against Nottinghamshire, as rain hits The Oval.

results.title: County Championship: Rain disrupts Surrey v Nottinghamshire

results.description: Ticket sales in English Twenty20 cricket soar in 2019 - and it's not just down to England winning the Cricket World Cup.

results.description: Simon Harmer takes 7-58 as Essex beat Surrey by an innings and lead Somerset by 12 points ahead of next week's title decider.

results.description: Dan Lawrence hits 147 as Essex reach 302-6 at the close on day two after bowling out Surrey for 174, a lead of 128.
